Name: Blood Brothers
About the game: Your brother has been cursed and his soul transferred into a cloak! Work together to find your way back through a castle to the artifact that started it all. Each brother has completely different gameplay, with a unique set of abilities and movement. Key Features: Unique Cooperative Gameplay: Use your unique abilities along with your partner to boost each other and become more powerful! Confront Enemies and Bosses: Fight everyone standing in your way using your abilities and halberd. Find Secrets: Explore the map and find what has been hidden away.
